comments:
EMF 2.2.0 I200508251028

When opening a .ecore file in the Sample Ecore Editor i get a
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError. This does not happen with EMF 2.1.0.

BTW: why is the editor called *Sample* ecore editor? AFAIK, it is still the best
free ecore editor around (still have to check out UMLX).

Koen

Sorry, I was still on Eclipse 3.1. In 3.2M2 it's OK.

The platform has deprecated setInput in favor of setInputAndNotify so you need
an Eclipse driver that has the new method.
